Text: List of Royal Air Force air chief marshals:  Throughout the history of the RAF there have been 140 RAF officers promoted to air chief marshal and at present two RAF officers hold the rank in an active capacity, namely the Chief of the Air Staff (the only dedicated RAF 4-star post) and the Chief of the Defence Staff (the only tri-service 4-star post currently occupied by an air chief marshal).
